Elliotte Harold wrote:

> Is there anyway to ask a server whether it considers two URLs to be the
> same? Should there be?

Not in HTTP. But you can express "Hesperus is Phosphorus" class 
equivalence with OWL using sameAs and you can expose a query service 
that can answer yes or no for sameAs using SPARQL.

cheers
Bill
